title: Ewer
provenance: Delomosne and Son, Ltdl, London; 1962 Phelps Warren, NY
description: Urn-shaped body, tapered neck, shaped lip with pouring spout, loop handle with 2 rows of cut facets along sides; sides decorated with engraved decoration of swags, flowers and the initials "S A N" under spout, fluting above and below; tapered foot on spool stem and flat disk-shaped base with faceted edge.
name: Ewer
